sentences.en: All these recipes exemplify my cooking: healthy, delicious and quick.
sentences.cn: 所有这些食谱例证了我的饭菜：健康、美味、快捷。

sentences.en: He turned out stories and sketches to exemplify the generalized jottings of his notebook.
sentences.cn: 他根据笔记里归纳起来的东西写了一些短篇小说和小品文.

sentences.en: However, there is no guarantee that that change will be the change you exemplify.
sentences.cn: 不过，没人能够保证那些改变会是如同你所示范的那个样子。

sentences.en: I'm going to exemplify one or two of these points.
sentences.cn: 我打算就论点中的一、两个方面举例说明.

sentences.en: In the experiment, skin was used to exemplify the cell membrane.
sentences.cn: 在这个实验中, 皮肤被用来测试渗透能力.

sentences.en: Problems are exemplified in the report.
sentences.cn: 问题都在报告中作了举例说明。

sentences.en: Samson, one of the heroes of the Hebrew scriptures, seems to exemplify a different understanding of the power of hair: his awesome strength abandoned him as soon as his locks were trimmed.
sentences.cn: 参孙，希伯来圣经里的英雄之一，似乎例证了一种对头发的力量的不同理解：他的非凡力量随着头发被剪掉而消失。

sentences.en: The building exemplifies the style of architecture which was popular at the time.
sentences.cn: 这栋大楼代表了当时流行的建筑风格。

sentences.en: The plays of Wilds exemplify the comedy of manners.
sentences.cn: 王尔德的戏剧是风尚喜剧的典范.

sentences.en: Their opposing demeanors were meant to exemplify their respective countries'contrasting state of education.
sentences.cn: 他们俩相背的行为被用来对比验证两国的教育状况.

sentences.en: Therefore, the efficiency of the hedge is an important exemplify for the futures market efficiencies.
sentences.cn: 因此, 套期保值的有效性成为了期货市场效率的重要体现.

sentences.en: They exemplify the unbridled ferocity of the protoss at war.
sentences.cn: 他们诠释了神族在战争中那无边无际的愤怒的力量.

sentences.en: To exemplify this theory, let us examine some species of insects.
sentences.cn: 为举例说明这种理论, 我们来检查一些种类的昆虫.

sentences.en: To exemplify what I mean , let us look at C . Bronte's Jane Eyre.
sentences.cn: 举个例子来阐述我的观点, 请看勃朗特的《简爱》.

sentences.en: To exemplify what I mean, let us look at our annual export of crude oil.
sentences.cn: 为举例说明我的意思, 让我们看看我们每年的原油出口.

sentences.en: To exemplify what I mean, let us look at our annual import of crude oil.
sentences.cn: 为举例说明我的意思, 让我们看看我们每年的原油进口.

sentences.en: To exemplify what I mean, let us look at our annual imports of crude oil.
sentences.cn: 为举例说明我的意思, 让我们看看每年的原油进口.

sentences.en: To exemplify what I mean, let us look at our annual output.
sentences.cn: 为了举例说明我的意思, 我们来看一下我们每年的产量.

trans.tran_en: to be a very typical example of something

trans.tran_cn: 是…的典型； 例示， 举例证明
trans.tran_en: to be a very typical example of something
